Scene10SpeakerDarwin: ^Dexa: Oh, my! You startled me! No need to yell.
^Dexa: Oh Nevermind then, probably wasn’t your fault. I get quite distracting listening to my plants you know…such interesting creatures.
^Dexa: Yes, exactly. No one ever seems to understand..ah well…who might you be young man?
^Dexa: Well your name surely isn’t “uh.” Go on then, spit it out. I can’t imagine a young sprout like you’d forget his name.
^Dexa: Darwin, eh? Okay Darwin, so are you lost or can I help you with something?

^Darwin: Well, I think so. Nezumi sent me, well Funé sent me. Nezumi sent me to Funé and then I went into the woods and took care of some awfully scary possums with my grandpa’s sword and, well…now I’m here.
^Dexa: Your grandpa’s sword, eh? Hmm..Nezumi and Funé. I see. You know what Darwin, I think you are in the right place. I am in need of some assistance if you think you could help?
^Choose to admit you’re not sure your exactly the right person for the job
^Choose to make fun of the fact that another adult needs your help

c-0: ^Darwin: You can count on me, Dexa! Nothing can stop me now that I know how to use this sword!
c-2: ^Darwin: Seems like every adult in this town needs help. But I guess I could lend a hand.

Dovetail: ^Dexa: Well, now that that’s settled. You see, it’s my mum. She’s been ill for a while. I’m an…herbalist of sorts, and I’ve tried every potion I know of to cure her, but none have worked. Well, I’ve tried every potion but one. But the ingredient I need only grows in one corner of the wood, and I fear the worst if I leave her for too long.
^Darwin: You want me to get the ingredient?
^Dexa: Would you? It’s a flower with purple petals. It grows in the mossy interior of the Unbridled Woods. If you find it, please bring it to me.
